effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.

short_effect.black_white: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.black_white: The user yells as if it is ranting about something, making the target’s Sp. Atk stat decrease.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user yells as if it is ranting about something, making the targets’ Sp. Atk stat decrease.
